# VoltorbFlip

A minigame of the Goldenrod and Celadon Game Corners in the Korean and Western releases of Pok√©mon HeartGold and SoulSilver.

A Python engine (and a CLI) for the game of [Voltorb Flip](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Voltorb_Flip).

## Install

```shell
pip install voltorb-flip
```

## Run

```shell
voltorb-flip new
```

## Play

```text
   1 2 3 4 5
 a ? ? ? ? ? 3 2
 b ? ? ? ? ? 5 1
 c ? ? ? ? ? 7 0
 d ? ? ? ? ? 6 1
 e ? ? ? ? ? 4 2
   6 5 5 3 6
   0 2 0 2 2

Instructions: Flip f<row><column>, Mark m<row><column>, Quit q
Lv. 1 | Score 1 >
```
